section.name: Current Status
section.p: For all current contributors and anyone wishing to contribute to or use HttpClient, we are now in the Beta 2 development stage.
The focus of Beta 2 development is documentation and minor, interface preserving bug fixes. Test cases, examples and user contributed code are always welcome.

Along with development related to Beta 2, much time will be spent in the near future planning for post 2.0 releases. Any suggestions, requests and/or contributions toward 2.1 and 3.0 will be gladly taken via the developer mailing list or bugzilla.

If you are interested in working on any existing bugzilla task, please reassign the bug to yourself and add the list address to the cc field (commons-httpclient-dev@jakarta-apache.org). When you have a patch, it can be attached directly to the bug. Any discussion can take place on the mailing list.
